raceInfo.name: Lowca

basicInfo.description: Castles located in the Great Frozen Ursen Territory, Vadasz peninsula, and the desert Badlands.

raceInfo.description:
There are three castles littered around Avarce; one resides deep in the Great Frozen Ursen Territory, one in the middle of the Desert Badlands, and one at the End of the Vadasz peninsula. These castles house some of the most skilled bipedal creatures on the planet. These castles are the homes and training grounds of the Lowca.
Lowca are essentially the perfect mercenary. They have no sense of moral superiority and are willing to take on any task, provided the person hiring them have the credits. They are extremely quick and smart, with an ability to think on their feet that rivals any other race. However, they cannot die by natural causes and throw themselves into situations that always mean certain death.

weapons.name: Assassin's Wrist Mounted Gun
weapons.description: A concealed gun favored by assassins. The gun springs open and can fire up to 5 silenced shots. Illegal in most cities and will raise eyebrows in others.

abilities.name: Hidden Weapon
abilities.description: If someone is searching for weapons on your body, they need to pass a DC 20 investigation check to find this weapon.

items.name: All or Nothing Coin
items.description: Once per day, instead of rolling a d20, you can flip a coin. Heads = critical hit; Tails = critical fail.

wearables.name: A Bucket of Disguise
wearables.description: The wearer of the bucket truly believes that they are invisible. It is highly sought after, but there is an interesting quality that only someone who wears it discovers. The wearer begins to hear thoughts that are not their own.
